summary.span: 命名空间包含支持 Visual Basic 中的 Visual Basic 运行时的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that support the Visual Basic Runtime in Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关在 Visual Basic 运行时中的语言元素的详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 语言参考](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md)。For more information about the language elements in the Visual Basic Runtime, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md).
